entry.em: ..DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CDT THIS MORNING

entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
PATCHY DENSE FOG
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 70
CALM WINDS

PARTLY SUNNY
PATCHY DENSE FOG IN THE MORNING
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 70
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S

MOSTLY CLEAR
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 90
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS AROUND 70
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 70

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 90
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
